name: Vole Complexity
description:
VOLE COMPLEXITY is a Top-Down Puzzle-Game, which will boil your brain.
Charlie, the vole got lost and is searching a way back home. Do you have what it takes to find the way through all the mazes which are getting more and more complex?

Features


Two different game modes:
    ﻿
  • „Going Up?“ - It's the main mode for the game. Find the way out and bring Charlie back home.
    Three different skill levels with 10 Floors for each (30 in total) will demand everything from you!

  • „Heading out“ - Complete a certain number of rooms consecutively to get a high score. Once started, the player sprints through each room solving the puzzle. Bonus Points are earned upon completion of each room. After running through all the rooms the player's score is then recorded on a top four list.

  • Collecting stars: Every maze has it's own specific minimum time and minimum steps you can theoretically make to beat the maze. If you find the fastest possible way through a maze you will earn a star which will unlock more achievments.
